name: Inform
flavor: Greatly improved tutoring of another creature.

purposeDescriptions.low: accelerates the learning of a skill that the caster has mastered
purposeDescriptions.mid: accelerates the mastery of a skill that the caster has mastered
purposeDescriptions.high: accelerates the learning of all skills that the caster has mastered
purposeDescriptions.invLow: drains experience of a skill that the caster has mastered
purposeDescriptions.invMid: drains experience of a skill chosen by the caster

effects.invHigh: Dazed, Distracted next turn, Stunned two turns from now
